name: mm::io::VmIo::write_slice

mm::io::VmIo::write_bytes.doc:
Writes a specified number of bytes from a given buffer at a specified offset.

 # No short writes

 Similar to [`write`].

 [`write`]: VmIo::write

doc:
Writes a slice of a specified type at a specified offset.

 # No short write

 Similar to [`write`].

 [`write`]: VmIo::write
